name: Novus Anlus
description:
An unidentified spaceship crash lands in a desert.  The newcomer must now repair their ship, so that they can go back to home base in order to fulfill their purpose of following the Leader.  

This is a sort of point and click game made for the IGMC 2022.  It features many items you can use to help you on the newcomer's quest to fix your ship.  In order to find them though, you will explore the desert as you solve mini puzzles along the way.
